metadata.title: CVE-2024-53197 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: usb-audio: Fix potential out-of-bound accesses for Extigy and MboxdevicesA bogus device can provide a bNumConfigurations value that exceeds theinitial value used in usb_get_configuration for allocating dev->config.This can lead to out-of-bounds accesses later, e.g. inusb_destroy_configuration.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
